TopicTitle: Thread subscription (Topic Following) list got wiped

Articles.Content: All of the threads I had been subscribed to before the upgrade were still listed as "followed" topics after the migration, when I looked yesterday. However today, they're all gone. I'm unsubscribed from all of the threads I was following. I'm going to have to track down all of the threads I was interested in and re-follow them now.
Thread subscriptions were sacrificed on the altar of eliminating the 502 errors. I sympathize, I had a *lot* of subscriptions.
Doh! Well, that explains a thing or two.

This is disappointing.

At least I saved my bookmarks to some of the threads.

Just now, Red Iron Crown said:

Thread subscriptions were sacrificed on the altar of eliminating the 502 errors. I sympathize, I had a *lot* of subscriptions.

And it deleted all our contacts!! Seems you guys used a hammer instead of a scalpel.
